title: When will degree college admission for 2020-2021 start? - Quora

response.answer_text: As we all know that COVID-19 is spreading in the whole world very rapidly. Due to this, it is very important for us to keep our health safe which can be done by staying at our home. If the college opens then the life of students will get riskier because these diseases spreads by touching anything or any person. Thus, by viewing this thing, it is not possible to open the degree college in 2020 and if the situation will get worst in the future then it can also be quite possible that in 2021 the college and school will not open. But the admission for the 2020-2021 session will start in the month of July the same as last year. But the difference that comes in the previous year and in this year is that the admission will take place with online mode. Yes, you have heard right, the student who wants to take admission in any school or college need to fill an online form and need to pay the fees online. If a student does not know about the process of admission then he or she can directly contact to us at gateway education as we provide each student the process in an easy language so that they will understand easily and do not find any problem in filling it. Gateway Education offers a wide range of technical and professional courses that help the students in making their career shine. We have colleges and institutes that have a great staff of trainers and faculty that are providing students with the best of their knowledge and experience and this provides opportunities to the students to take their career to new heights. Also, our placement cell is best among the other colleges that provide the students to get placed in top MNCs. For more information and details kindly visit the official website of Gateway Education.

As per the current conditions there is minimal chance of colleges opening the admissions. Because of following reason - 12 board exams are left. Everything can't be done online. They can't remove remaining exams. 12 lakh students are affected. Those who studied may loss faith. No money and technology to get everything online and verified. Some apps are bane to government. And if they does everything then the classes may begin from September and admission procedure in August starting (which will be very hectic).
